origins.name: Demon
origins.description: Demon basic attacks have a 40% chance to burn 20 mana from their target and return some mana to the attacker.
origins.tiers: (2) 15 mana returned (4) 30 mana returned (6) 45 mana returned

origins.name: Glacial
origins.description: Glacial attacks gain a chance to stun enemies for 1.5s
origins.tiers: (2) 20% Chance to Stun (4) 33% Chance to Stun (6) 50% Chance to Stun

origins.name: Noble
origins.description: +50 Armor & MR and heal 30 health on-hit

origins.name: Void
origins.tiers: (2) One random void champion deals true damage this combat (4) All your void champions deal true damage this combat

origins.name: Pirate
origins.tiers: (3) At the end of combat against another player, gain up to 4 additional gold

origins.name: Wild
origins.description: Attacks generate stacks of Fury (stacks up to 5 times). Each stack of Fury gives 10% Attack Speed
origins.tiers: (2) Wild Allies Only (4) All Allies (their basic attacks canâ€™t miss)

origins.name: Yordle
origins.description: Yordles gain a chance to dodge enemy attacks
origins.tiers: (3) 30% Chance to Dodge (6) 60% Chance to Dodge (9) 90% Chance to Dodge

origins.name: Dragon
origins.tiers: (2) Dragons gain 75% resistance to Magic damage

origins.name: Hextech
origins.description: When combat begins, the ally team launches and detonates a pulse bomb, temporarily disabling nearby enemy items for 7 seconds.
origins.tiers: (2) 15 mana returned (4) 30 mana returned (6) 45 mana returned

origins.name: Exile
origins.tiers: (1) If an Exiles has no adjacent allies at the start of combat, they gain a shield equal to 100% of their maximum Health

origins.name: Ninja
origins.description: The Ninja Trait is only active when you have exactly 1 or all 4 Ninjas.
origins.tiers: (1) Ninja gains +50 Attack Damage and Ability Power (4) All Ninja gain +80 Attack Damage and Ability Power

origins.name: Phantom
origins.tiers: (2) At the start of combat, curse a random enemy and set their HP to 100

origins.name: Robot
origins.tiers: (1) Robots start combat at full mana

class.name: Elementalist
class.description: Innate: Elementalists gain double mana from attacks
class.tiers: (3) At the start of combat, summon a Golem

class.name: Brawler
class.tiers: (2) 250 Bonus Health (4) 500 Bonus Health (6) 900 Bonus Health

class.name: Gunslinger
class.description: Gunslinger attacks gain a 50% chance to trigger additional attacks on-hit
class.tiers: (2) Attack 1 extra enemies (4) Attack 2 extra enemies (6) Attack 4 extra enemies

class.name: Guardian
class.tiers: (2) At the start of combat, Guardians grants +45 Armor to adjacent allies. This Armor can stack (except guardians).

class.name: Ranger
class.description: Rangers gain a chance to double their attack speed every 3s for the next 3s
class.tiers: (2) 25% Chance to Double Attack Speed (4) 70% Chance to Double Attack Speed

class.name: Knight
class.tiers: (2) 15 Damage Blocked (4) 35 Damage Blocked (6) 60 Damage Blocked

class.name: Shapeshifter
class.description: Shapeshifters gain bonus maximum Health when they transform
class.tiers: (3) 60% Bonus Maximum Heath (6) 100% Bonus Maximum Heath

class.name: Sorcerer
class.description: Innate: Sorcerers gain double mana from attacks. All Allies have increased Spell Power
class.tiers: (3) +40% Spell Power (6) +100% Spell Power (9) +175% Spell Power

class.name: Assassin
class.description: Innate: At the start of combat Assassins leap to the farthest enemy. Assassins gain bonus Critical Strike Damage.
class.tiers: (3) 75% Crit Damage & 5% Crit Chance (6) 150% Crit Damage & 20% Crit Chance (9) 225% Crit Damage & 30% Crit Chance

class.name: Blademaster
class.description: Blademaster attacks have a 45% chance to trigger additional attacks on-hit
class.tiers: (3) One Additional Attack (6) Two Additional Attacks (9) Four Additional Attacks
